onResume().Description: Called when the application calls onResume on the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdView_E@. The adapter is expected to resume any processing associated with the ad being shown.

onDestroy().Description: Tears down the adapter control. This is called at the end of the mediator's life cycle. The adapter is expected to release any resources and shut down. After this method is called, any subsequent calls to any other method on this adapter may throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@. This method is not guaranteed to be called. There are a number of reasons that this method can be skipped, such as a force close of the application.

onPause().Description: Called when the application calls onPause on the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdView_E@. The adapter is expected to pause any processing associated with the ad being shown.

ClassDesc: Adapter for third party ad networks. This class is the common interface of @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationBannerAdapter_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationInterstitialAdapter_E@ and it defines common methods. There is no reason to implement this interface directly. Instead, adapters should implement @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationBannerAdapter_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#MediationInterstitialAdapter_E@.
